√dabh 'harm'

present: [1.] dábhati etc.   -- [5.] dabhnoti etc.  

perfect: dad/bha  debhus  dadámbha  dadabhanta  

aorist: [1.] dabhús   -- [3.] adadambhat   -- [5.] adambhīt  

[future: dambhiṣyati  dambhitā  ]

verbal: dabdhá  dabdhum  dambhitvā  davdhvā  -dábhe  

secondary: passive: dabhyate   -- intensive: dādambh-  dādabh-   -- desiderative: dípsati etc.  dhīpsati  dhipsa-  didambhiṣa-   -- causative: dambháyati etc.  

derivatives: dábha  dábhya RV.  dabhī́ti RV.  dabdhi B.S.  -dabhna? AV.  dabhrá V.+  dābha V.B.  dābhya V.+  dambha E.+  dambhaka C.  dambhin E.+  -dámbhana V.+  dipsú V.
